file_content.text: My lord. Moff Ilyan Regus. I'm recruiting the Empire's finest for the final push in the war. Operation Dark Ice.
We would do well to have a Dark Council member's support.
I would have to hear some details before I lend my support to anything.
Fill me in.
I am a very busy Sith. You're going to have to persuade me.
What's in it for me?
There's little I can offer a Sith Lord, beyond the increased prestige that naturally comes from winning a victory for the Empire.
I've always been a strong supporter of the Imperial military.
Absolutely.
I wasn't sure you felt that way. I'm glad to hear it.
Agent--is that what I should call you? This is Moff Regus, head of Operation Dark Ice.
I'm gathering the Empire's best and brightest to fire the final shot into the heart of the Republic.
Your record is unimpeachable. Can we count on your support?
I'd need to hear a briefing, first.
Maybe.
I'm duty-bound to serve the Empire.
I'd be honored.
If this is going to be extracurricular, I'll require compensation.
I don't work for free.
My lord. Moff Regus. I'm recruiting the Empire's most powerful warriors for the final push in the war. We call it Operation Dark Ice.
Everyone's heard of your recent victory over Darth Baras. Do we have your support?
The Republic will bow before the Empire's might.
Of course.
That's our hope.
It's always a pleasure to serve the Empire.
I'd be honored.
We share your patriotism.
If there wasn't a war going on, I'd make one. I relish the chance to fight for the Empire.
I live for battle.
We are honored to have you among our ranks.
Hunter. Moff Regus. I'm calling to recruit you for a special project. It's called Operation Dark Ice.
It'll be the most dangerous thing you've ever done, but it could very well win the war.
You're the best hunter in the galaxy. Can we count on your services?
I don't make a practice of taking jobs blind.
Fill me in.
Doesn't the Empire have enough grunts it can send into battle?
Why me?
I'm not looking for a grunt. If you accept, you'll be granted a temporary battlefield commission. The grunts will obey you.
I don't do volunteer work.
I don't work for free.
You'll be well-paid, and you'll receive a temporary battlefield commission. It'll be your operation, if you accept.
Moff Ilyan Regus. I'm recruiting the Empire's best and brightest for the final push in the war. Operation Dark Ice.
Your reputation precedes you. Do we have your support?
What is Operation Dark Ice?
I need more details.
I'll do whatever it takes to win the war.
Of course.
What incentive do I have to help?
Why should I?
The Empire always remembers its loyal servants.
I'm sending the coordinates for the planet Ilum. Used to be a frozen wasteland only a few Jedi bothered with.
But a few weeks ago, Imperial scientists discovered a way to turn Adegan lightsaber crystals into the most significant breakthrough in military technology since the hyperdrive.
Let me guess--these Adegan lightsaber crystals can only be found on Ilum.
These crystals are from Ilum?
Ilum has the biggest supply, and our scientists have had more success with Ilum's crystals than any other kind.
And what exactly does this have to do with Ilum?
How does Ilum figure?
The hyperdrive revolutionized galactic warfare. Nothing before or since has matched it in importance.
You're exaggerating.
I'm not exaggerating.
Ilum has the biggest supply of Adegan lightsaber crystals in the galaxy, and our scientists have been most successful with Ilum's crystals.
The Empire won on Corellia, but it was costly. We're outnumbered, we need the technological edge--we need Ilum's crystals. But as usual, the Republic's intent on interfering.
I'll take care of the Republic. You focus on getting those crystals.
I can handle them.
Then we have an arrangement.
So you need me to crack some skulls while you handle the boring stuff?
You want me for the wetwork.
You could say that.
How is the Republic interfering? Do you have a plan for stopping them?
What are they doing?
I have a few ideas, but I want your input.
Ilum's a nasty place. Cold as Hoth, covered in ice and mountainous terrain. Makes moving large armies impossible. I hope to see you soon.
Operation Dark Ice = complete success // T9-M6 = awaits further instructions
Operation Dark Ice = located on Ilum // Moff Regus = requests your assistance
T9-M6 = requests your attention // = urgent message from Grand Moff Regus
Moff Regus = commander of special forces // T9-M6 = patching through now
Ilum = accessible by starship // T9-M6 = uploading relevant star maps as directed
Operation Dark Ice = critical importance // Sentients = should proceed to Ilum now
T9-M6 = property of Moff Regus // T9-M6 = unavailable for general service
